rodrigo mexia born city castin gonçalo piçarros son got great booty rich came acceptable hinojosa much pleased taking vela nunnez might oppose prevent design panama rescue son gonçalo piçarro whose freedom would joyfull father encouraged happy success sailed toward panama near place rodrigo de carvajal came forth meet gave intelligence matter panama city prepared oppose hinojosa rather pleased discouraged news putting posture war sailed forward untill day month october year 1545 came within sight city panama fleet eleven sail ship hundred fifty men aboard upon appearance city great consternation souldiers repaired colour pedro de casaos chief officer five hundred men command merchant officer unexperienced men war knew fire musquet unwilling engage fight especially men coming peru formerly accostomed deal traffick merchandize seemed strange contend weapon moreover considered great part estate effect peru would confiscated gonçalo piçarro case appear arm force howsoever formed joined several body commanded respective officer chief first pedro de casaos general aria de azebedo came afterwards lived cordoua time grandchild inhabit captain officer john fernandez de reboledo andren de arayza vice king two captain john de guzman john de yllanez several noble person present resolved defend city service majesty others affrighted late outrage insult bachicao inclined preserve like tyranny feared hinojosa considering sort people deal landed two hundred men old veterane souldiers well appointed armed fifty left aboard defence ship marched along coast flanked cannon carrying aboard boat belonging ship much annoyance enemy case make assault upon gave farther order aboard ship soon come engagement presently hang vela nunnez prisoner taken pedro de casaos seeing resolution pedro de hinojosa came meet intention either overcome dye party come within musquet shot clergyman friar came city carrying wood cross served banner colour clad mourning sadness countenance
